channel.title: Re-Colored Items List [new]
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt]Because the last thread failed so hard. I have made a new thread for re-colors.[/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt]If you have a Re-color and would like it added to this thread, just post a picture of it as well as working ints for it as a reply and I will add it to the list.[/size][/center]

item.title: Re-Colored Items List [new]
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

Yea well this is int recolors only lol. Not sure how many people do them but i might be able to fill it up. Atm im working on a Guthix, Saradomin, and Zamorak war armour sets. Pretty much like the the robes that already exist for them but instead of robes, it is recolors of my favorite armour: skeletal

Read full topic

item.title: Re-Colored Items List [new]
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Lol my bad. recoloring through the ints, stupid me. feel like a ruhtard now. Yeah paste bin would probably work. Have them maybe post ints in post on here and then you put on pastebin?
(FYI Most people aren’t smart enough to recolor through the ints and just recolor and make a new model with materials.)

Read full topic

item.title: Re-Colored Items List [new]
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

I just maxed a post out on another thread with 2k. Also, there are no downloads atm. Just posted ints because thats what a recolor is and i would much rather copy and paste ints rather then download them first but thats just my opinion.

Srry about any possible bad grammar as i posted this with my ipod.

Read full topic

item.title: Re-Colored Items List [new]
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I’m pretty sure limit is 20,000. I’ve posted over lol. And put the ints in the download… so you don’t have to take up limit.

Read full topic

item.title: Re-Colored Items List [new]
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

If people posted all their stuff here the thread would max out cause you can only have 2000 characters a post. But i think i have an idea. If i just move the ints to pastebin or something. It might prevent some of those threads from ever existing.

Read full topic

item.title: Re-Colored Items List [new]
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

thought the point of this was to not make people post threads about recolors… not require them to make a topic to be on list…

Oh yeah and the cape section will be full lol…

item.title: Re-Colored Items List [new]

Guys you post a picture of your recolor and a link to your thread. This isn’t about show offs.
